name: Jenkins - Build Information
description: The Jenkins - Build Information dashboard provides insights into a specific build. Panels display information on build parameters, source control management, commit details, Test cases, pipeline stages, console logs, and any configuration change prior to the build.

panels.name: Change Log Information
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Scm_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "jobName", "buildNumber", "changeLog" as Name, Number, Commit
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| replace(Commit, ",", "\n\n") as Commit
| replace(Commit, "author", "\nauthor") as Commit
| replace(Commit, "message", "\nmessage") as Commit
| replace(Commit, "[", "") as Commit
| replace(Commit, "]", "") as Commit
| where !isEmpty(Commit)
| count as Count by Master, Commit
| fields Master, Commit
| limit 10

panels.name: Instructions
panels.properties:

panels.name: Failed Tests
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Test_Result {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number" as Name, Number
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| json "testResult" as statusValues
| parse regex field=statusValues "(?<TestResult>\{[^\}]+\})" multi
| json auto field=TestResult
| where status="Failed"
| className as %"Class Name" | testName as %"Test Name"| duration/60 as %"Test Duration" | status as %"Test Status"
| errorStackTrace as %"Error Stack Trace"| errorDetails as %"Error Details"
| count by Master, %"Class Name", %"Test Name", %"Test Duration", %"Error Stack Trace", %"Error Details"
|fields - _count

panels.name: Job Run Duration
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Job_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number", "jobRunDuration" as Name, Number, Duration
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| Duration/60 as Duration
| avg(Duration) as %"Duration in minutes" by Number
| fields %"Duration in minutes"

panels.name: Job URLs
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Job_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number", "jobBuildURL", "upstreamJobURL" as Name, Number, URL, UpStreamURL
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| if(isEmpty(URL) ,"", tourl(URL, concat("Build URL - ", name))) as %"Build URL"
| parse field=URL "*://*/" as domain, url_base nodrop
| if(isEmpty(UpStreamURL) ,"", tourl(concat(domain, "://",url_base,"/",UpStreamURL), concat("UpStream URL - ", name))) as %"Upstream Build URL"
| replace(URL, concat("/",number,"/"), "") as Config_URL
| concat(Config_URL, "/configure") as Config_URL
| tourl(Config_URL, concat("Config URL - ", name)) as %"Configuration URL"
| count by Master, %"Build URL", %"Upstream Build URL", %"Configuration URL"
| fields Master, %"Build URL", %"Upstream Build URL", %"Configuration URL"

panels.name: Job Parameters
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Job_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number", "jobMetaData", "jobStartTime", "triggerCauses" as Name, Number, jobMetaData, jobStartTime, triggerCauses nodrop
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| replace (jobMetaData, "{", "{\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\"") as jobMetaData
| replace (jobMetaData, "\",", "\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\"") as jobMetaData
| replace (jobMetaData, "}", "\n\t\t\t\t\t\t}") as jobMetaData
| concat("JOB START TIME\t\t - \t", jobStartTime, "\n\nTRIGGER CAUSES\t - \t", triggerCauses, "\n\nJOB PARAMETERS\t - \t", jobMetaData) as %"Job Run Information"
| count by %"Job Run Information"
| fields %"Job Run Information"

panels.name: Most Recent Console Logs
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc
| _sourceHost as Master
| _sourceName as SourceName
| where SourceName matches "{{Name}}#{{Number}}*"
| parse field=_raw "[*] *" as Time, %"Log Message"
| trim (%"Log Message")
| count by Time, Master, %"Log Message"
| sort by Time
| fields Time, Master, %"Log Message"
| limit 50

panels.name: Build Information
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Job_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number", "hudsonVersion", "label", "result", "description", "jobType", "user", "nodeName" as Name, number, hudsonVersion, Label, Result, Description, JobType, User, NodeName nodrop
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| if(Result matches "SUCCESS", ":white-heavy-check-mark:", ":prohibited:") as icon
| lookup utf as Result from https://s3.amazonaws.com/sumologic-app-data/emoji.csv on shortname=icon
| concat(concat("NAME				 - 	", Name, "

MASTER			 - 	", Master, "

NUMBER			 - 	",Number ,"

HUDSON VERSION	 - 	", hudsonVersion),
"

LABEL				 - 	", Label
,"

RESULT				 - 	", Result, "

DESCRIPTION		 - 	", Description, "

JOB TYPE			 - 	", JobType, "

STARTED BY			 - 	", User, "

NODE NAME			 - 	", NodeName) as %"Job Basic Information"
| count by %"Job Basic Information"
| fields %"Job Basic Information"

panels.name: SCM Information
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Scm_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "jobName", "buildNumber", "scmURLs", "branches", "scmType", "revision" as Name, Number, scmURLs, branches, scmType, revision
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| replace(scmURLs, "git ", "") as scmURLs
| replace(scmURLs, " ", "\n") as scmURLs
| replace(branches, " ", "\n") as branches 
| concat("SCM TYPE\t - \t", scmType, "\n\nSCM URLs\t - \t",scmURLs,"\n\nREVISION\t - \t" ,revision,"\n\nBRANCHES\t - \t", branches) as %"Scm Information"
| count by %"Scm Information"
| fields %"Scm Information"

panels.name: Pipeline Stage Details
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Pipeline_Stages {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number" as Name, Number
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| json "stages" as StagesPipeline   
| parse regex field = StagesPipeline "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "id", "stageId", "name", "startTime", "duration", "status", "steps", "error" as ID, %"Stage ID", %"Stage Name", %"Start Time", %"Stage Duration", %"Stage Status", %"Stage Steps", %"Stage Error" nodrop
| where %"Stage Status" matches {{StageStatus}}
| replace (%"Stage Error", ",", "\n\n") as %"Stage Error"
| replace (%"Stage Steps", ",\"", "\n\n") as %"Stage Steps"
| replace (%"Stage Steps", ",", "\n") as %"Stage Steps"
| count by ID, %"Stage ID", %"Stage Name", %"Start Time", %"Stage Status", %"Stage Duration", %"Stage Error", %"Stage Steps"
| tolong(ID) as ID
| sort by ID
| fields - _count, ID

panels.name: Top 5 Slowest Stages
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Pipeline_Stages {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number" as Name, Number
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| json "stages" as StagesPipeline
| parse regex field = StagesPipeline "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "id", "stageId", "name", "startTime", "duration", "status", "steps", "error" as ID, %"Stage ID", %"Stage Name", %"Start Time", %"Stage Duration", %"Stage Status", %"Stage Steps", %"Stage Error" nodrop
| sum(%"Stage Duration") as %"Stage Duration in seconds" by %"Stage Name"
| sort by  %"Stage Duration in seconds"
| limit 5

panels.name: Test Cases Distribution
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc "logType":"Job_Status" {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number" as Name, Number
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| json "testResult"
| parse regex field=testResult "\"(?<Key>.*?)\":(?<Value>.*?)[,}]" multi
| where key in ("skips", "failures", "passes")
| fields key, Value
| avg(Value) by Key

panels.name: Configuration Change before Build
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc (Job_Started OR Config_Change) {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| {{Number}} as Build_Number
| join (json "eventTime", "message" as FirstEventTime, FirstMessage|parse field=FirstMessage "User * started the job * with build number as *." as FirstUser, FirstJobName, FirstBuildNumber | where FirstBuildNumber = Build_Number|fields FirstJobName, FirstEventTime) as firstStart,  
(json "eventTime", "message" as SecondEventTime, SecondMessage|parse field=SecondMessage "User * started the job * with build number as *." as SecondUser, SecondJobName, SecondBuildNumber |where SecondBuildNumber = Build_Number-1| fields SecondJobName, SecondEventTime) as SecondStart,
(json "userId", "userName", "eventTime", "message", "fileDetails.Old_File_Data", "fileDetails.Current_File_Data" as ConfigChangeUserId, ConfigChangeUserName, ConfigChangeEventtime, ConfigChangeMessage, Old_File_Data, Current_File_Data nodrop|parse field=ConfigChangeMessage "* changed configuration for the file jobs/*/config.xml." as ConfigChangeUser, ConfigChangeJobName | fields ConfigChangeUserId, ConfigChangeUserName, ConfigChangeJobName, ConfigChangeEventtime, Old_File_Data, Current_File_Data) as Config_Change
on firstStart.FirstJobName = SecondStart.SecondJobName AND firstStart.FirstJobName = Config_Change.ConfigChangeJobName 
| where Config_Change_ConfigChangeEventtime < firstStart_FirstEventTime AND Config_Change_ConfigChangeEventtime > SecondStart_SecondEventTime
| base64Decode(Config_Change_Old_File_Data) as %"Old File Data"
| base64Decode(Config_Change_Current_File_Data) as %"Current File Data"
| Config_Change_ConfigChangeUserId as %"User Id"
| Config_Change_ConfigChangeUserName as %"User Name"
| Config_Change_ConfigChangeEventtime as Time
| count by Time, %"User Id", %"User Name"
| fields Time, %"User Id", %"User Name"

panels.name: Top 10 Slowest Tests
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Test_Result {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number" as Name, Number
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| json "testResult" as statusValues
| parse regex field=statusValues "(?<TestResult>\{[^\}]+\})" multi
| json auto field=TestResult
| className as %"Class Name" | testName as %"Test Name"| duration/60 as Duration | status as %"Test Status"
| concat(%"Class Name",".",%"Test Name") as %"Test Name"
| Duration/60 as Duration
| sum(Duration) as %"Test Duration in minutes" by %"Test Name"
| sort by %"Test Duration in minutes"
| limit 10

panels.name: Error, Warning, Exception
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc
| _sourceHost as Master
| _sourceName as SourceName
| where SourceName matches "{{Name}}#{{Number}}*"
| parse field=_raw "[*] *" as Time, %"Log Message"
| trim (%"Log Message")
| where %"Log Message" matches "*WARNING*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*ERROR*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*fail*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*warning*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*error*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*fail*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*Exception*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*Fail*" OR %"Log Message" matches "*Error*"
| count by Time, Master, %"Log Message"
| sort by Time
| fields Time, Master, %"Log Message"
| limit 20

panels.name: Status
panels.queryString:
$$jenkinslogsrc Job_Status {{Name}}
| _sourceHost as Master
| json "name", "number", "result" as Name, Number, Result
| where Name = {{Name}} AND Number = {{Number}}
| where Result != "SUCCESS"
| count by Result
| fields - _count
